text: Me izegha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, e fo, nɨ zurara guizbangɨra mɨgɨava, mɨgɨrɨgɨar vamɨra gumazamiziba bar me ganɨdi. Gumazir ziaba itiba o gumazir kɨniba, nɨ akar vamɨra me mɨgɨava guizbangɨra Godɨn arazibar men sure gami. E Godɨn arazim gɨn mangɨva, gavmanɨn dagɨaba Sisar danɨngam o puvatɨgham? E ivezam, o ivezan kogham?”
